Name: Welcome to the Pool Hall
About the game: Purchasing this game allows you to help us make improvements as we start at an early proof of concept and move to a full fledged user driven experience. Welcome to the pool hall is a Community driven pool project for all ages. The game currently has 3 game modes which are a basic training mode, a pool mode and a arcade pvp tanks mode. The current version of the project is #006 and from here on forward we want to directly involve the community. The best place to leave ideas or bug reports is either the Steam forum or our Dualgm discord find able when clicking the website link on this store page. In the screenshots you will be able to find the plans for the Future of the Project.
